abstract: Halloween lesson ideas, featuring a video with Bill Cunningham, the venerable "On the Street" reporter.
snippet: Halloween lesson ideas, featuring a video with Bill Cunningham, the venerable "On the Street" reporter.
lead_paragraph: This audio slide show, celebrating Halloween in Manhattan, is from October 2010, and is part of the "On the Street" series reported and narrated by Bill Cunningham, a journalist who is in his early 80s and has worked for The New York Times since the 1970s.

headline.main: Haunting Ideas: Halloween in the Classroom and 'On the Street'
